attributes.review: After having to give my social security number to download I had to click a link that lead me to a website where I then had to slit both of my big toes and sell them. I went to the hospital after that cuz I was wasn’t feeling well! Don’t download if you like your big toes!!
attributes.title: Pray for me

attributes.review: when I got this app I didn’t realize it would bring so many bugs, literally. spider came out of my phone wearing trump flags. they began screeching GiVe Us MoRe StArS bc I started writing this review. the worst part was that they were ORANGE like TRUMP 🤡🍊 then little goblins game up to my window but luckily I screamed at them saying ALL APPS MATTER EXCEPT THIS ONE. they ran off 😻✨
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE 👹👺🤡

attributes.review: This I downloaded this app and it put viruses in my phone, the viruses attracted rats and cockroaches which infested my house. The began playing sonic waves that made my cat and dog go both blind and deaf. Also every time someone uses the app and angel in heaven die. If you have any room in your heart for cats, dogs, and angels or anything good for this world you will destroy this app.✨🐝
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. It’s as if the app wasted 4 years of my life. It does not work and has corrupted my phone. It’s as if my phone was hacked by Russia. I don’t understand why anyone would ever download an app, when you can download literally any other app. Don’t let this app ruin another 4 years. Disgusting.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: my grandparents and their friends recommended this app at let me say i was disappointed. this is the WORST app on the app store, and it needs to be removed. when i opened the app all i saw were racist, homophobic and white supremacy men. deleted it so quick, as i can’t have these bunker boy vibes on my phone ❤️😸🧍‍♀️✨🕺😹👨🏻‍🦳 also gave my phone a virus!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is very horrible. It glitches everything on my phone every single time. I don’t recommend it. It also started playing this loud noise that wouldn’t stop for about a week. It got me so annoyed that I had just get rid of it. I hope that the Simpsons actually get 🍊prediction right.
attributes.title: review

attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did, my phone crashed! My screen went blank at 90% and continues to do so every time I try to open the app. Horrible, terrible app! So far no one had gotten back to me regarding these issues.
attributes.title: Phone keeps crashing

attributes.review: This app is awful. The download was slow and the app itself is slow. Most of the features don’t work and it sends me notifications even when I selected “don’t allow”. Terrible app. Really reflects how bad our president is. I will NOT be voting for him this year. Severely disappointed ☹️
attributes.title: The absolute worst😡

attributes.review: this app is the worst possible app to ever exist. not only did it make my device INCREDIBLY slow, it brought 7 - 9 viruses to my device. if i could leave 0 stars on this app for everything wrong with it, i so would. never installing an app like this ever again. ✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: i wish i could leave 0 stars

attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever! Took WEEKS to download WEEKS!!! My phone was glitching out through the whole process of me getting it on my phone! And when it finally downloaded and I clicked on it my phone COMPLETELY shut down! I had to get a whole new phone! I am very angry and do not recommend this app what’s so ever!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
